archimate:BusinessObject.name: MOE needs
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Identification of the MOEs (Roedler and Jones, 2006), which define the information needs of the decision makers with respect to system effectiveness to meet operational expectations

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: "Der Bedarf an Wirksamkeitsmessungen umfasst die Wirksamkeitskennzahlen (MOEs) (Roedler und Jones, 2006), die den Informationsbedarf der Entscheidungsträger in Bezug auf die Wirksamkeit des Systems definieren, die operativen Erwartungen zu erfüllen".
Identification of the MOEs (Roedler and Jones, 2006), which define the information needs of the decision makers with respect to system effectiveness to meet operational expectations
